1   package org.lindbergframework.beans.util;
2   
3   import java.lang.reflect.Field;
4   import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
5   import java.math.BigDecimal;
6   import java.util.Map;
7   
8   import org.apache.commons.beanutils.BeanUtils;
9   import org.apache.commons.beanutils.BeanUtilsBean;
10  import org.apache.commons.beanutils.ConstructorUtils;
11  import org.apache.commons.beanutils.ConvertUtilsBean;
12  import org.apache.commons.beanutils.Converter;
13  import org.lindbergframework.exception.BeanPopulateException;
14  import org.lindbergframework.exception.LoadXmlPropertyException;
15  import org.lindbergframework.util.ReflectionUtil;
16  
17  
18  /**
19   * Utilitary class for bean operations.
20   * 
21   * @author Victor Lindberg
22   *
23   */
24  public class BeanUtil {
25  	
26      /**
27       * Populate a bean with properties and values mapped in map argument.
28       * 
29       * @param bean bean to populate.
30       * @param properties properties and values map.
31       * @throws BeanPopulateException population failed.
32       */
33  	public static void populate(Object bean, Map properties) throws BeanPopulateException{
34  		try {
35  			BeanUtils.populate(bean, properties);
36  		} catch (IllegalAccessException ex) {
37  			throw new BeanPopulateException(ex);
38  		} catch (InvocationTargetException ex) {
39  			throw new BeanPopulateException(ex);
40  		}	
41  	}
42  	
43  	/**
44  	 * load a property in the bean. 
45  	 * 
46  	 * @param bean bean instance.
47  	 * @param property property to populate.
48  	 * @param value value to populate in the property.
49  	 * @throws LoadXmlPropertyException property loading failed.
50  	 */
51  	public static void loadProperty(Object bean, String property, Object value) throws BeanPopulateException{
52  		try {
53  			MultiLevelPropertyUtilsBean propertyUtilsBean = new MultiLevelPropertyUtilsBean(bean.getClass());
54  			
55  			BeanUtilsBean beanUtils = new BeanUtilsBean(new ConvertUtilsBean(),propertyUtilsBean);
56  			beanUtils.copyProperty(bean, property, value);
57  		} catch (Exception ex) {
58  			throw new BeanPopulateException(ex);
59  		} 
60  	}
61  	
62  	/**
63  	 * instantiates a bean.
64  	 * 
65  	 * @param <E> bean type expected.
66  	 * @param clazz bean class.
67  	 * @param args contructor arguments.
68  	 * @return bean instance.
69  	 * 
70  	 * @throws NoSuchMethodException constructor for arguments specified not found.
71  	 * @throws IllegalAccessException class or constructor accesss failed.
72  	 * @throws InvocationTargetException invocation failed.
73  	 * @throws InstantiationException bean instantiation failed.
74  	 */
75  	public static <E> E createInstance(Class clazz,Object... args) 
76  	                  throws NoSuchMethodException, IllegalAccessException, 
77  	                         InvocationTargetException, InstantiationException{
78  		return (E) ConstructorUtils.invokeConstructor(clazz, args);
79  	}
80  	
81  	/**
82  	 * Copy properties from source to target bean.
83  	 * @param source source bean.
84  	 * @param target target bean.
85  	 * @throws IllegalArgumentException copy property failed.
86  	 * @throws IllegalAccessException property access failed. 
87  	 */
88    	public static void copyProperties(Object source, Object target)
89  			throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalAccessException {
90  		Field[] fieldsSource = source.getClass().getDeclaredFields();
91  		
92  		ReflectionUtil.makeAttributesAccessible(fieldsSource);
93  
94  		for (Field field : fieldsSource) {
95  			Object valueField = field.get(source);
96  			field.set(target, valueField);
97  		}
98  	}
99    	
100   	public static Converter getConverter(Class clazz){
101   	  return BeanUtilsBean.getInstance().getConvertUtils().lookup(clazz);
102   	}
103   	
104   	public static <E> E tryConvert(Object value, Class<E> convertType){
105   		Converter converter = getConverter(convertType);
106   		return (E) converter.convert(convertType, value);
107   	}
108   	
109 }
